mapper.select: SELECT kids_product_no, program_no, pi.img_no, program_name, dayweek, pi.products_no, p.products_name, program_content, products_tag, system_name, price, products_size, products_sub_name, origin_name FROM kids_product k JOIN products_img pi ON k.products_no = pi.products_no JOIN products p ON p.products_name = k.products_name WHERE origin_name not like 'View%' ORDER BY kids_product_no

SELECT products_tag, products_name, img_no, system_name, price, products_size, products_sub_name FROM products_img pi JOIN products p ON p.products_no = pi.products_no WHERE products_tag = #{products_tag} AND origin_name like 'View%' ORDER BY img_no asc
